columns.name: name
columns.description: The friendly name that identifies the app service environment

columns.description: Contains ID to identify an app service environment uniquely

columns.description: Contains the kind of the resource

columns.description: The resource type of the app service environment

columns.name: status
columns.description: Current status of the App Service Environment

columns.name: provisioning_state
columns.description: Provisioning state of the App Service Environment

columns.description: Default Scale Factor for FrontEnds

columns.description: Indicates whether the dynamic cache is enabled or not

columns.description: Scale factor for front-ends

columns.name: has_linux_workers
columns.description: Indicates whether an ASE has linux workers or not

columns.description: Specifies which endpoints to serve internally in the Virtual Network for the App Service Environment

columns.name: is_healthy_environment
columns.description: Indicates whether the App Service Environment is healthy

columns.description: Indicates whether the App Service Environment is suspended or not

columns.description: Name of the Virtual Network for the App Service Environment

columns.description: Name of the resource group where the virtual network is created

columns.name: vnet_subnet_name
columns.description: Name of the subnet of the virtual network

columns.description: Custom settings for changing the behavior of the App Service Environment.
